subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: In the hours after his brother Timmy died of a bicycle accident short of his eighth birthday, Boston University defenseman Matt Gilroy vowed to wear Timmy’s No. 97 for the rest of his life.
snippet: In the hours after his brother Timmy died of a bicycle accident short of his eighth birthday, Boston University defenseman Matt Gilroy vowed to wear Timmy’s No. 97 for the rest of his life.
